function.name: str_replace_editor

content:
The file /workspace/pytest/src/_pytest/capture.py has been edited. Here's the result of running `cat -n` on a snippet of /workspace/pytest/src/_pytest/capture.py:
   422	    return EncodedFile(f, encoding or default_encoding)
   423	
   424	
   425	class EncodedFile(object):
   426	    errors = "strict"  # possibly needed by py3 code (issue555)
   427	
   428	    def __init__(self, buffer, encoding):
   429	        self.buffer = buffer
   430	        self.encoding = encoding
   431	
   432	    def write(self, obj):
   433	        if isinstance(obj, six.text_type):
   434	            obj = obj.encode(self.encoding, "replace")
   435	        elif _PY3:
   436	            raise TypeError(
   437	                "write() argument must be str, not {}".format(type(obj).__name__)
   438	            )
   439	        self.buffer.write(obj)
   440	
   441	    def writelines(self, linelist):
   442	        data = "".join(linelist)
   443	        self.write(data)
   444	
   445	    @property
   446	    def name(self):
   447	        """Ensure that file.name is a string."""
   448	        return repr(self.buffer)
   449	
   450	    @property
   451	    def mode(self):
   452	        """Return a text-mode-like mode string (hide binary flag) to avoid
   453	        consumers mistaking this stream for accepting bytes.
   454	        """
   455	        m = getattr(self.buffer, "mode", "")
   456	        # advertise text-mode: remove binary flag if present
   457	        return m.replace("b", "")
   458	
   459	    def __getattr__(self, name):
   460	        return getattr(object.__getattribute__(self, "buffer"), name)
   461	
   462	
   463	CaptureResult = collections.namedtuple("CaptureResult", ["out", "err"])
   464	
   465	
   466	
Review the changes and make sure they are as expected. Edit the file again if necessary.

extras.diff:
--- /workspace/pytest/src/_pytest/capture.py
+++ /workspace/pytest/src/_pytest/capture.py
@@ -448,0 +449,9 @@
+
+    @property
+    def mode(self):
+        """Return a text-mode-like mode string (hide binary flag) to avoid
+        consumers mistaking this stream for accepting bytes.
+        """
+        m = getattr(self.buffer, "mode", "")
+        # advertise text-mode: remove binary flag if present
+        return m.replace("b", "")
